welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Edegem, Belgium! A charming city known for its historical landmarks and beautiful green spaces. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all the wonderful things our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/Antwerp Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Deurne/Antwerp Airport, used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is free for the first 2 hours, additional time can be purchased.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Zoersel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, mainly used for low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Brussels Airport, dedicated to long-haul flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a limit of 1 hour per device per day.
